document_data.name: Sledge Pettifeet
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sledge Pettifeet''' was a member of [[the Guild]] from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''If I were you, I'd turn around and walk right out of this alley. Now.''|Sledge Pettifeet}}
document_data.Description: Sledge appeared to be a middle-aged [[halfling]] woman with light skin, brown eyes, and dirty blonde hair. She wore an [[archer]]'s [[Leather armor|leathers]] dyed in the Guild's green colors and carried a [[bow]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Sledge Pettifeet was tasked with standing guard at the secret entrance into Baldur's Gate's [[Undercellar]], where the Guild's Guildhall was hidden. Whilst a [[half-orc]]ish enforcer [[Tusgront]] manned the main entrance, Sledge was ready to dispatch any unwanted guest from a distance.
